content.rendered:
The Oven Cleaning Company

 

Beginning in 2006, The Oven Cleaning Company began out of a desire to assist the busy people of Melbourne by helping keep their homes beautiful. Humbly starting with a husband and wife team, who personally experienced the frustration that can come from trying to clean an oven, The Oven Cleaning Company has now grown to over 10,000 clients, cleaning and detailing appliances across Melbourne and the Mornington Peninsula.

Our hope would be to be able to restore your appliance to showroom quality using our specialised entirely environmentally friendly methods leaving your appliance beautifully clean and safe to use straight away.

Our clients range from stay at home mums to schools needing their food tech area cleaned and detailed. All of our clients have one thing in common, a domestic oven, cooktop, Rangehood or BBQ that is in need of some TLC.

We are so confident that our team of fully trained technicians will do an amazing job that we guarantee that we will happily return and re-clean for free if you are not happy with the outcome.

We look forward to meeting you and finding out how we can help keep your home beautiful.

Owners and Managers

Sally and Gerald Vandermeer.
